COURT NO. 05 a

The Honourable Mr Justice R. SURESH KUMAR
The Honourable Mr Justice C. SARAVANAN

TO BE HEARD THROUGH VIDEO CONFERENCING / HYBRID MODE / PHYSICAL MODE ON THURSDAY THE 19TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2024 AT 10.30 A.M.(Regular List) - 6. COURT LINK ALSO AVAILABLE IN https://www.mhc.tn.gov.in/vclink CASES WILL BE TAKEN UP AS FOLLOWS: (ADMISSION and MPS - ON ALL DAYS) MONDAY,TUESDAY and WEDNESDAY - WRIT APPEAL - SERVICE and WP - JUDICIAL SERVICE THURSDAY and FRIDAY TAX CASES ARISING FROM INDIRECT TAX LAWS (INCLUDING CUSTOMS, CENTRAL EXCISE, GST, SALES TAX ETC., (A) CASES ALREADY ADJOURNED BY MENTIONING SHOULD NOT BE MENTIONED FOR BEING ADJOURNED ONCE AGAIN. (B) IN ANY EVENT, NO MENTIONING WILL BE PERMITTED WITHOUT THE PRESENCE OF THE OPPOSITE SIDE COUNSEL. (C) NO ADJOURNMENT WILL BE ENTERTAINED BY MENTIONING AT THE TIME OF RESUMPTION OF COURT IN RESPECT OF 'AFTER NOTICE CASES' AND 'FINAL HEARING CASES'
TO CONDONE DELAY IN REPRESENTATION

FRIDAY - ALL MATTERS.

The Honourable Mr Justice C. SARAVANAN

ORDERS TO BE PRONOUNCED THROUGH VIDEO CONFERENCING / HYBRID MODE / PHYSICAL MODE ON THURSDAY THE 19TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2024 AT 2.15 P.M. ( SITTING IN HIS LORDSHIP'S CHAMBER)(Motion List) - 5. CASES ALREADY ADJOURNED BY MENTIONING SHOULD NOT BE MENTIONED FOR BEING ADJOURNED ONCE AGAIN. 7. IN ANY EVENT, NO MENTIONING WILL BE PERMITTED WITHOUT THE PRESENCE OF THE OTHER SIDE COUNSEL.
